Translations.Text: Vi not those hav befriended popol DI est koler? Ili nek aparten vi nor them. Ili deliberately jxur mensog
DI prepar them severe retribution. Miserable ja est ki ili uz do
Ili uz their oaths means de repelling path DI. Consequently ili incurred shameful retribution
Nek their mon nor their infan help them DI. Ili incurred hellfire wherein ili abide forever
Tag ven when DI resurrects them all Ili jxur Him tiam just as ili jxur vi tuj opini ke ili really est tuj! Ja ili est efektiv liars
Diabl posed them kauxz them disregard di message These est parti diabl. Absolutely parti diabl est losers
Surely those oppose DI His messenger est lowliest
DI DEKRET MI My messengers testament plej assuredly win DI est Powerful Almighty

Vi ne trov popol kred en DI Last Tag befriending those oppose DI His messenger ecx ili est their parents their infan their siblings their gent! Por these Li dekret faith their kor, supports them kun inspiration el Him admits them into gxarden flu streams wherein ili abide forever DI PLACX them ILI PLACX Him! These est parti DI. plej assuredly di parti est winners
